title: CSing Be Removed
body: Hey guys, I've been thinking. I found out a new entire way to make League of Legends more balanced. Have you noticed when someone with more CS than you, you are more likely to lose, correct? Well,I think that if minions were ***removed***, it will make the game more balanced and possibly more fun. This will take League of Legends to a whole new level.

replies.body: There's an item for that. {{item:3301}} . Makes the minions last hit for you.

So... League of Infinite snowballs?

How do you propose we get XP and Gold? How do you propose we punish people for being pushed out of lane?

Maybe make it a little more fair to those people being crushed, but you're coming at this from the entirely wrong angle.

Minions are a powerful balancing lever, and removing them entirely removes about six different strategic components of the game.

Next you'll say we should get rid of jungle camps, since someone could be so ahead of you that they're taking yours... that's not riot's problem. That's your and your team's.
Ignoring the fact that you're a moron, OP is the original poster, not another commenter.
He is trolling you so hard right now... you know that, right?
Trolling is no reason not to know basic things like the meaning of OP.
I agree with this! Csing is pretty stupid to be honest. All the minions do is help the enemy kill me which is so unfair that i have to burn {{summoner:4}}
so basically all you want league to be about is who can kill who first?
If you want to not have to cs, play Strife.

So basically Dominion?

Minions still give gold over there, but farming them is typically a trap unless you're running bottom lane.
